title: Staff Nurse ( Pediatric Specialist Clinic ) 5.5 days
company_info: Aber care is a Healthcare Recruitment Agency providing Permanent, Part-time and Locum placements for Nursing Homes, Day Care Centers, Community Hospitals and Restructured Hospitals. Our years of experience working within the healthcare industry have given us in-depth knowledge and insights into the manpower needs of the sector. Beyond providing a good match for talents for full time and locum employment, we also take on roles as training consultants and provide foreign healthcare placement. EA Licence No. 18C9070
job_category: Environment / Health, Healthcare / Pharmaceutical, Medical / Therapy Services
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Job scope
Provision of basic nursing duties (eg. phlebotomy, vaccination and wound dressing)
Provide medical care and counselling to patients
Perform basic triage, assist in minor procedures
Dispensing of medication
Maintain drugs inventory level and perform quarterly stock take
Management of patient’s medical records
Perform clinical and administrative duties
Handle phone calls and enquiries
Schedule patient appointments and registration
Booking of referral appointments
Assist in managing smooth and efficient clinic operations
Responsible for planning and maintaining clinical & service quality
Requirements
Singaporean Only
Nitec or Diploma in Nursing
At least 2 years of working experience, preferably in Paediatrics field
Enrolled or Registered with Singapore Nursing Board
Good patient care and service attributes
Able to communicate in Mandarin to Mandarin speaking client
Assist Doctor in translating from English to mandarin to Mandarin speaking client
Team player who is able to work independently
Able to start work within short notice
5.5 days
Check out http://abercare.sg/jobs-vacancies/ for more details

Interested applicants may email your updated resume to career@abercare.sg or contact us at +65 6721 9231.

title: Registered Nurses
company_info: Singapore Christian Home ( SCH ) is a not-for-profit outfit committed to caring for destitute and persons from very low income families requiring long term medical and nursing care.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Responsibilities
Supervising and monitoring the care, welfare and well-being of residents
Handling the daily nursing operations of the ward and implementing nursing requirements and regulations
Providing feedback and suggestions on the needs of the residents and for service improvement
Planning and implementing new services, programmes and activities
Recording, safe-keeping and administration of medication and subcutaneous injections
Assisting doctors during ward rounds and following-up on recommended changes
Requirements
Registered with the Singapore Nursing Board
Possess a valid Practicing Certificate from Singapore Nursing Board
Candidates with clinical experience in pediatrics ward are welcomed to apply
Ability to manage the Ward well with minimal supervision
Display qualities in motivating, leading and supervising junior staff
Proactive and supportive in carrying out new initiatives
Interested candidates please send your resume to hr@schome.org.sg

title: School Nurse
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Roles & Responsibilities:

Boutique international school is looking for an experienced school nurse. We are a multi-cultural, warm, and supportive team that offers educational opportunities to international students of diverse learning preferences and special education needs.

School Nurse

The School Nurse will have to work closely with the school to provide immediate first aid to school’s children and staff if required.

Responsibilities:
Guide well-being and safeguard practice across school level
Develop school’s awareness on health and safety
Attend to children and staff (if required) by accurately identify illness or injury and provide basic stabilisation and triage within a nurse’s capabilities
Assist in administer medication and refer for medical treatment for affected students or staff as necessary
Maintain and update health record accordingly
Maintain and update school medical supplies and equipment and ensure timely stock up
Assist in tracking of attendance at key events as required
Qualifications and Skills Requirements:
Minimum Diploma in Nursing or related field and hold a registered nurse licence
Minimum 2 years of experience working in related field
Attended at least 1,000 hours of clinical experience
Up to date certification such as basic life support, Pediatric Advanced Life Support (PALS), and Advanced Cardiac Life Support (ACLS).
Safeguarding

The Perse School Singapore is committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of all the students in its care and expects all applicants to share this commitment. We follow safe recruitment practices which are aligned to the recommendations of the International Task Force on Child Protection. We hold ourselves to a high standard of effective recruiting practices with specific attention to child protection. All appointments are subject to an interview, identity checks, criminal record checks and successful references.

title: Nurse Educator / Senior Staff Nurse
company_info: BTI Executive Search, previously known as BTI Consultants started its operations in 1982 and has since been a market leader in Executive Search ever since. Our philosophy states that every leader must make a difference to drive positive change and optimal results to achieve an organisation’s set business goals. As such, we especially pay attention to our leaders’ selection. Our borderless search operations, spanning 6 countries, including Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, and Thailand ensures an established network that is wide and deep to connect our clients with quality executive talent, catering to each clients’ unique organisational needs.
job_category: Consulting, Education and Training, Healthcare / Pharmaceutical
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Reputable educational and healthcare institution located in Singapore is looking to hire a Full-Time Lecturer. It offers a wide range of certificate programs across various fields of study, including Health Sciences - Nursing.
Conduct lectures, tutorials & clinical sessions
Plan, develop, review and update the teaching curriculum
Supervise & assess students in the clinical areas
Clinical facilitation with the students/learners in hospital settings
Requirements
SNB Registered
At least 5-8years of nursing experience
Discipline: Perioperative, A&E, Pediatrics, Critical Care, Diabetes Management, Community Health, ORthoedics, Medical Surgical, Palliative

title: Staff Nurse (Pediatrics / O&G / Med&Surg / NICU / AICU / OT / Delivery Suite)
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
The Staff Nurse is primarily responsible for the general care of all patients in the unit. Ensure maintenance of nursing care standards and conformance to quality systems and procedures of the hospital.
Requirements:
Degree/Diploma in Nursing
Registered with Singapore Nursing Board
Keen in setting such as Paediatric, Medical & Surgical, O&G, Post-Natal, NICU, etc
At least 2 years’ experience in specialty disciplines such as Delivery Suite, Operating Theatre, NICU
Must be bilingual and PC-literate
Able to work shift hours (3 rotating shifts)
Ability to commence work immediately is an added advantage
